name: VR Dance Star
description:
This is a leisure and entertainment game with dance and diy as the theme. Players can customize their own character image in the start interface, and then enter the dance studio to practice dance. In the dance studio, you can choose various dances and lead us to dance The image of the character can also set the dance speed, and can also go to dance club scenes for dance training. The whole process is full of rhythm and fun. It is a very casual and relaxing game.

Instructions:
The left handle can interact with the ui menu, the menu button calls out the menu, and the trigger button confirms.
The touchpad on the right handle allows the player to choose the direction of the transmission, and the trigger button confirms the transmission.
